task.summary: Default task
Change methods in playscreen to use inventory screens
Make a victory item in the stuff factory
Create new victory item at world generation
Make method to add up stairs on first level
Create exit stairs on world generation
Add methods to check victory and show proper screen
Remove unnecessary key event checks
Change spawn rate of fungi
Add D to key event checks
Fix typo
Add food value getter and modifier to Item class
Update creatures to leave a corpse with a food value

Give creatures an eat method
Initialize maxFood and currentFood in constructor
Create an EatScreen and implement all methods from parent
Add key event for the 'e' key
Make helper method to display hunger status
Add modifyFood to actions to increase hunger each turn
Fix modifyHP so currentHP can't exceed maxHP
Put atk/def values and getters/setters in Item class
Create some weapons and armors in the factory
Add factories for making random weapons/armors
Make random weapons/armors in createItems method
Add missing semicolon
Fix typo in item creation methods
Fix createItems to only make 8 of each per level
Add weapon/armor variables and getter/setter
Add methods for equipping/removing items
Unequip item if it gets eaten or dropped
Update atk/def getters to add weapon/armor values
Make equip/unequip public instead of private
Make an equip screen for wearing items
Add key event for wear/wield
Add the PathFinder class and all methods
Make Path class
Add zombie AI that hunts the player
Add a zombie maker method to the factory
Update playScreen to add zombies on each depth

Add xp and level, with methods to get and modify them
Initialize starting level to 1 in constructor
Add gainXP method to add XP to creature on kills
Create abstract class representing level-up option
Move LevelUpOption into its own package
Add controller to give level up options
Add method to level up AI automatically
Add autoLevelUp method to creatureAI
Create methods to handle level up bonuses
